snippet: After being condemned as failing to uphold Catholic doctrine, the sisters are sending representatives to Rome to speak with Vatican officials.
abstract: Leadership Conference of Women Religious announces that it will not accept the Vatican's condemnation and will send representatives to Rome to open a dialogue with Vatican officials; Vatican said the nuns failed to uphold Catholic doctrine.
lead_paragraph: After being condemned as failing to uphold Catholic doctrine, the sisters are sending representatives to Rome to speak with Vatican officials.
